item.title: More than 150 U.S. military aircraft were used in the operation to capture Venezuela’s Maduro, including stealth fighters and bombers
item.description: “This thing was so organized,” Trump said. “And they go into a dark space with machine guns facing them all over the place.”

item.title: Trump makes it clear shocking Venezuelan regime change is largely about oil: ‘They stole our oil … We’re going to make a lot of money’
item.description: Trump says American oil companies will rebuild the Venezuelan industry and take a "tremendous amount of wealth out of the ground."

item.title: Ouster of Maduro government sparks celebrations among Venezuelans in South Florida
item.description: "There’s fears. There’s excitement. There’s so many years that we’ve been waiting for this. Something had to happen in Venezuela. We all need the free...

item.title: Trump says ‘we’re going to run’ Venezuela and is not afraid to put U.S. troops on the ground after Maduro’s capture
item.description: "We're not afraid of boots on the ground. We're not afraid of it. We're we don't mind saying it, and we're gonna make sure that that country is run pr...

item.title: What happens next in Venezuela? The regime’s foundation remains in place even after U.S. capture of Maduro, analyst says
item.description: "So removing Maduro did not necessarily change the fundamental equation of control."
